---
title: "CERISE: Capacity building and technologies for Green skills orientedness at European Universities"
---




The general objective of the project is strengthening capacity of European Higher Education Institutions (HEIs) in delivering courses and services that enhance and recognize green skills and expand green culture. 

**Specific objective 1:** Support HE curricula development to advance HE students’ green skills and attitudes through digital technologies.  

**Specific objective 2:** Develop a technological tool that will foster the recognition of green skills in the HE sector.
